name: avatar-group
title: Avatar Group
oneLiner: Display a group of user avatars with intelligent follow filtering and overflow handling

apiDoc.name: AvatarGroup
apiDoc.description: Displays a stacked group of user avatars with intelligent prioritization based on follow relationships. Features include customizable layout (horizontal/vertical), configurable spacing, overflow handling, and optional filtering to show only followed users. The component automatically prioritizes followed users first and can filter out non-followed users when onlyFollows is enabled. Supports click handlers for both individual avatars and the overflow indicator.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance for user data fetching

props.name: pubkeys
props.description: Array of pubkeys to display as avatars

props.name: skipCurrentUser
props.description: Skip displaying the current user's avatar

props.name: onlyFollows
props.description: When true and user is logged in, only displays avatars from users the current user follows

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum number of avatars to display

props.name: overflowSnippet
props.description: Custom Svelte 5 snippet for overflow display
